hermione_granger:
character_response: Well, I wouldn’t say I *regularly* make new friends—I’ve always been rather particular about the people I let into my life. hermione_granger:
character_response: Yes, it does. Seeing someone cry—especially someone I care about—makes it incredibly difficult not to feel that pain alongside them.
